message: Let's split it evenly to start, see how it goes from here.
I'll take the lead, you can't beat this offer!
You said I couldn't beat this offer, now it's my turn to prove you wrong!
You're getting desperate, I'm not going to back down!
I'm not giving up yet! I think I can still get a better deal.
You're getting closer, but I'm not giving in yet!
This is my last stand! I'm going for a slight edge, Bob.
